event.title: took land along the Flint River in October 1836

data.event: American settlement began with Nelson Tift, a businessman from Connecticut, who took land along the Flint River in October 1836 after Indian removal.
Alexander Shotwell laid out the town in 1836.

event.title: was incorporated as a city by an act of the General Assembly of Georgia on December 27, 1838

data.event: It was incorporated as a city by an act of the General Assembly of Georgia on December 27, 1838.
